attributes.action: overturn the ruling made by Shenley Brook End & Tattenhoe Parish To evict tenants for having had cockerels on the allotment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After being made aware of the rules regarding cockerels on allotments every effort was made to re-home the cockerels. Eviction notices were issued. No consideration was made for the time factor of trying to re-home healthy birds rather than destroy them. 
Consideration should also be taken into account when one re-stocks with chicks. Sex cannot be determined, only time.
Evictions should only be deemed necessary for Sub-letting, Theft, Growing of Illegal Substance, Nuisance/Abuse to other Tenants, Unauthorised Access to Site.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with your parish council.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
